description: This file defines an Angular service 'AuthService' that manages user authentication, including login, token handling, and logout functionalities. It interacts with an HTTP backend to authenticate users and uses signals for reactive state management.

classes.name: AuthService
classes.description: An Angular injectable service for managing user authentication, JWT token storage, and session handling.

methods.name: login
methods.description: Authenticates the user with provided email and password, retrieves a JWT token from the server, and stores it locally.

methods.name: token
methods.description: Retrieves the current session token from memory or local storage.

methods.name: logout
methods.description: Clears the session token from memory and local storage, effectively logging out the user.

ctags.name: response
ctags.pattern: /^      const response: any = await lastValueFrom(this.http.post(loginUrl, { email, password }));$/
